lead_paragraph: The police in Northern Ireland have appealed for the public’s help to find the statue of Manannan Mac Lir, which was stolen from a remote mountainside.
snippet: The police in Northern Ireland have appealed for the public’s help to find the statue of Manannan Mac Lir, which was stolen from a remote mountainside.

headline.main: Missing: Bare-Chested Celtic God, Last Seen in Northern Ireland
